mdRecord.dcterms:title: The Rand McNally New commercial atlas map of South Carolina
New commercial atlas map of South Carolina
South Carolina automobile road map
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rand McNally and Company.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: each map 48 x 65 cm. on sheet 53 x 72 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The main map shows county lines and is keyed numerically to show the tracks of 27 railroads. It also shows electric lines and steamship lines. Map on verso has a secondary title in red of "South Carolina automobile road map." The roads are not numbered.
"Principal cities" directory is printed in the left margin and "123 E" appears at the lower right corner of both maps.
The road map is "divided into 10 mile squares."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Transportation--South Carolina--Maps
